The goal of `dtools` is to provide useful tools to make data analysis faster and easier.

## Installation

You can install the development version of tools like so:

``` r
remotes::install_github("arturhgq/dtools")
```
## Examples

### Check
```{r}
  library(dtools)
  check_r_pipe(T)
```

### Get
```{r}
  get_index(mtcars, cyl)
  get_varname(mtcars, 2)
```

## Fill

```{r}
  data.frame(
    var1 = c(NA,2,3,NA),
    var2 = c(NA,NA,3,3),
    var3 = c(NA,1,3,3),
    var4 = c(10,NA, 2,NA),
    group = c(1,1,2,2)
  ) -> data

  fill_by_group(data, group, var1, var3)
```

## List

```{r}
  here::here("R") |> 
    list_files(".R")
```

```{r}
  list(
    obj1 = mtcars,
    obj2 = airmiles
  ) -> list1
  
    list(
    mtcars,
    airmiles
  ) -> list2
```

```{r}
list_remove(list1, "obj1")
```

```{r}
list_remove(list2, 1)
```
